column4: Hi I'm new I just installed ubuntu 5.10 and I just wondering how I can enter this command on gnome terminal sudo mkdir /media/windows ok it prompt me for a password but I cant type anything because it wont let me. I just want to have access to my microsoft windows xp  files (I'm dual booting)
just type your password. It doesn't show anything because the password is masked (to keep ppl from reading over your shoulder)
